definition: abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican

sentences.english: There are places in the Vatican Archives where human beings cannot walk.
sentences.chinese: 在梵諦岡資料庫裏好幾個地方，人類不能行走。

sentences.english: It is like looking at the Vatican site to find out all about Islam.
sentences.chinese: 這就像去梵諦岡尋找伊斯蘭教徒一樣。
